form.agentToolsDescription: Delegate tasks to other specialized agents
form.noAgentTools: No agent tools configured. Add agents to use them as tools.
form.createDescription: Configure your agent with custom tools, LLM settings, and knowledge
form.editDescription: Update your agent's configuration and settings
form.llmRequired: Please select an LLM provider and model
form.name: Agent Name
form.systemPromptPlaceholder: You are a helpful AI assistant...
form.systemPromptHelp: Define the agent's behavior and personality
form.systemPromptHint: Use {{VARIABLE_NAME}} to insert context variables. Variables are auto-detected.
form.contextVariablesHint: Define variables that can be used in the system prompt. Values are provided at runtime.
form.modelHelp: Choose the specific model to use
form.selectModelToConfigureParams: Select a model to configure its parameters
form.maxTokensDescription: Maximum number of tokens to generate in the response
form.topPDescription: Controls diversity via nucleus sampling. 0.5 means half of all likelihood-weighted options are considered.
form.frequencyPenaltyDescription: Reduces repetition by penalizing tokens based on their frequency. Range: -2.0 to 2.0
form.presencePenaltyDescription: Encourages new topics by penalizing tokens that have appeared. Range: -2.0 to 2.0
form.stopSequencesDescription: Sequences where the model will stop generating further tokens
form.temperatureHelp: Controls randomness: 0 is deterministic, higher values are more creative
form.maxTokensHelp: Maximum length of the generated response

tools.dateTimeDescription: Get current date and time information

form.knowledgeBaseHelp: Select a knowledge base to give your agent access to specific information
form.toolsNote: Tools can be managed globally in the Tools menu

toolConfig.title: Configure Tool: {{toolName}}
toolConfig.description: Define how each parameter should be handled when the agent calls this tool
toolConfig.noParameters: This tool has no configurable parameters
toolConfig.functionNameHint: Leave empty to use the original tool name. Only alphanumeric characters and underscores are allowed.
toolConfig.descriptionHint: Custom description for this tool. The LLM uses this to understand when to call the tool.

strategy.llmDescription: Let the LLM determine this parameter's value

jsonOutput.title: Output Format
jsonOutput.enableDescription: Force agent responses to follow a specific JSON schema
jsonOutput.schemaHint: Define the structure of the agent's output using JSON Schema format

kbConfig.retrievalSettingHint: Select which retrieval setting to use when querying this knowledge base. The default setting will be used if none is selected.

testBench.variableRequired: Both key and value are required
testBench.variableDuplicate: Variable with this key already exists
testBench.streamingModeDesc: Receive responses in real-time as they are generated
testBench.blockingModeDesc: Wait for complete response before displaying

detail.conversationsDesc: View and manage all conversations with this agent

configuration.title: Activate Google Custom Search
configuration.description: To enable the search playground, you need to configure Google Custom Search Engine (CSE) credentials. WaterCrawl uses these to perform searches via the Google API.

step1.title: Step 1: Get Your Credentials
step1.description: Obtain your API Key and CSE ID from Google Cloud Console and the Programmable Search Engine control panel.

step2.title: Step 2: Update Configuration
step2.description: Add the following lines to the .env file located in the backend root directory of your project:
step2.note: Replace the placeholder values with your actual credentials.

step3.title: Step 3: Restart Backend
step3.description: After saving the .env file, restart your backend server for the changes to be applied.

chunking.automaticTooltip: When enabled, chunk overlap will be automatically set to 20% of chunk size

chunking.chunkSizeHelp: Number of characters per chunk. Recommended: 1000-1500 characters.
chunking.description: Proper text chunking is essential for effective information retrieval. Chunks should be large enough to capture context but small enough for precise matching.
chunking.title: Chunking Configuration

embedding.description: Embeddings convert text into numerical vectors for semantic search. Choose whether to enable embeddings for your knowledge base.
embedding.modelHelp: Select the embedding model to use for this knowledge base.
embedding.providerConfigHelp: Select the provider configuration for embeddings.
embedding.semanticDescription: Enable embeddings to convert text into vectors for semantic similarity search.
embedding.textOnlyDescription: Skip embeddings for a lighter setup. Search will be based on exact text matching only.
embedding.title: Embedding Configuration

form.subtitle: Configure your knowledge base settings for optimal information retrieval.

summarization.contextHelp: Provide additional context to guide the summarization process.
summarization.contextRequired: Context is required for context-aware summarization
summarization.description: Enhance each chunk with AI-generated summaries to improve search relevance. This adds cost but can significantly improve retrieval quality.
summarization.disabledDescription: Skip summarization to minimize costs. Search will use raw chunk text only.
summarization.enabledDescription: Add AI-generated summaries to each chunk for improved search quality.
summarization.modelHelp: Select the LLM model for generating summaries.
summarization.providerConfigHelp: Select the provider configuration for summarization.
summarization.llmConfigHelp: Configure advanced LLM parameters like temperature, max tokens, etc.
